statements: UPDATE Influencers SET total_followers = 10000, partnership_status = 'Active' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Influencers SET collaboration_type = 'Fashion', sponsored_content = true WHERE influencer_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE Influencers SET collaboration_type = 'Micro-Influencer', partnership_status = 'Active' WHERE influencer_id = 1
UPDATE Influencers SET total_followers = 100000, sponsored_content = TRUE WHERE influencer_name = 'JohnDoe'
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Collaborations SET partnership_details = 'Product Launch Campaign' WHERE collaboration_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 10000, influencer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Collaborations SET partnership_details = 'New campaign launched today!', sponsored_content = FALSE WHERE collaboration_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 10000, influencer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Collaborations SET sponsored_content = TRUE, collaboration_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE brand_id = 2 AND influencer_id = 3;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 100000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Collaborations SET sponsored_content = TRUE WHERE collaboration_date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE influencers SET followers = 5000, collaborations = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE collaborations SET end_date = '2023-12-31', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE influencers SET followers = 150000, collaborations = 20 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE collaborations SET start_date = '2022-10-15', end_date = '2023-01-31' WHERE influencer_id = 2 AND blogger_id = 3;
UPDATE influencers SET followers = 5000, website = 'www.updatedwebsite.com' WHERE id = 'a7e6d81c-7d87-4e8f-b78d-878a4447c9f9';
UPDATE partnerships SET end_date = '2022-12-31', brand_id = 'c7fe3d08-770d-4bd8-97eb-bcf45967299c' WHERE influencer_id = '4ae0cec0-8322-49dc-8057-c4159d19c091';
UPDATE influencers SET followers = 15000 WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE partnerships SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE influencer_id = (SELECT id FROM influencers WHERE name = 'Jane Smith');
